Package de.humatic.nmj

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NetworkMidiClient
    This is a functionless interface only used for tracking clients of NetworkMidiPorts.
    NetworkMidiListener
    Listener interface for incoming Midi data.
    NMJSystemListener
    Provides notifications on channel discovery, state change and error events.
    RTPRecoveryListener
    Listener interface for notification on packet loss recovery attempts.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NetworkMidiInput
    This class represents a MIDI input port.
    NetworkMidiOutput
    This class represents a MIDI output port.
    NetworkMidiPort
    Baseclass for MIDI port objects.
    NetworkMidiSystem
    The api's core singleton object providing access to MIDI ports.
    NMJConfig
    This is the main configuration interface for nmj network MIDI channels.
    NMJConfigDialog
    NMJConfigDialog provides a quick and dirty UI for configuring and inspecting nmj channels.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NMJException
